1.8.9.solution: If you're using a Microsoft account, you need to enable online multiplayer. You can enable this setting [here](https://account.xbox.com/en-us/Settings) under the Xbox One/Windows 10 Online Safety tab. If you are a minor, you may need a parental figure's help.
This is an issue with Skytils' smart font renderer setting. Please disable it temporarily until a fix has been implemented.

1.18.2.solution: Essential wasn't able to load properly! Please join their [Discord server](https://discord.gg/essential) for help.

causes.value: java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: Could not initialize class gg.essential.api.EssentialAPI
